t: Psalm 45
The Glories of the Messiah and His Bride
To the Chief Musician. Set to “The Lilies.” A Contemplation of the sons of Korah. A Song of Love.
My*pn heart is overflowing with a good theme; I*ld recite my composition concerning the King; My*ld tongue is*i the pen of a ready writer.
You*ln are fairer than the sons of men; Grace*ld is poured upon Your lips; Therefore*ld God has blessed You forever.
Gird*ld Your sword upon Your*i thigh, O Mighty One, With*ld Your glory and Your majesty.
And*ld in Your majesty ride prosperously because of truth, humility, and*i righteousness; And*ld Your right hand shall teach You awesome things.
Your*ld arrows are*i sharp in the heart of the King’s enemies; The*ld peoples fall under You.
Your*ln throne, O God, is*i forever and ever; A*ld scepter of righteousness is*i the scepter of Your kingdom.
You*ld love righteousness and hate wickedness; Therefore*ld God, Your God, has anointed You With*ld the oil of gladness more than Your companions.
All*ld Your garments are*i scented with myrrh and aloes and*i cassia, Out*ld of the ivory palaces, by which they have made You glad.
Kings’*ld daughters are*i among Your honorable women; At*ld Your right hand stands the queen in gold from Ophir.
Listen,*ln O daughter, Consider*ld and incline your ear; Forget*ld your own people also, and your father’s house;
So*ld the King will greatly desire your beauty; Because*ld He is*i your Lord, worship Him.
And*ld the daughter of Tyre will*i come*i with a gift; The*ld rich among the people will seek your favor.
The*ln royal daughter is*i all glorious within the*i palace;*i Her*ld clothing is*i woven with gold.
She*ld shall be brought to the King in robes of many colors; The*ld virgins, her companions who follow her, shall be brought to You.
With*ld gladness and rejoicing they shall be brought; They*ld shall enter the King’s palace.
Instead*ln of Your fathers shall be Your sons, Whom*ld You shall make princes in all the earth.
I*ld will make Your name to be remembered in all generations; Therefore*ld the people shall praise You forever and ever.
